competitors.name: Mercury Interactive
competitors.notes: Application performance management, acquired by HP 2006

competitors.name: Wily Technology
competitors.notes: APM vendor, acquired by CA Technologies 2006

context: In 2005, Dynatrace was founded as dynaTrace software in Austria. The APM market was dominated by Mercury Interactive (acquired by HP 2006) and Wily Technology (acquired by CA 2006). Dynatrace differentiated with PurePath technology for deep transaction tracing. Application performance monitoring was evolving from infrastructure monitoring to application-centric views. The market was preparing for major consolidation with HP and CA acquisitions.
